Title: Side Quest: Kill Sauron
Text:
Now the dark ruler Sauron is weakened
and we should destroy him once and for all!

He is down the road to the east in his fortress, Barad-Dur!
Quick before he escapes again!
CompleteText:
You have destroyed Sauron!

Back with him to the shadow world he came from!
You have now restored balance to Middle-earth!

The task is accomplished... And the age of man and peace has come!

The eagle is already waiting for you! @p
